text: [Music]
hello my name is roger dunslury
in this video we will walk through how
to subscribe to an ami annual private
offer with flexible payment schedule or
fps enabled
what is an ami annual private offer
ami-based software products can offer an
annual subscription pricing model in
which the buyer agrees to purchase an
agreed number of instance types and pay
as per the payment terms defined on the
offer which can be upfront at specific
dates and or in multiple installments
customers can apply one annual
subscription to an aws marketplace
software product to one amazon ec2
instance
customers can also continue to launch
and run the product using instance types
not included in the annual purchase the
customer will be billed for the
additional usage at the ami products
hourly rate
charges for using amazon ec2 and other
services from aws are separate and in
addition to what you pay to purchase aws
marketplace software products
there are two ways to access an ami
private offer
the buyer will need to sign into the aws
account that was targeted on the private
offer
the first option for accessing a private
offer is to open the private offer url
that was sent by the seller
the second option is for the buyer to
navigate to the aws marketplace homepage
search for the product they want to
purchase
choose continue to subscribe
then select the private offer from the
drop down menu titled offer selection
after navigating to the private offer
the buyer can review the instances
offered along with the payment terms
after reviewing choose accept contract
then choose confirm
please wait until the acceptance banner
appears this means the buyer is
successfully subscribed to the annual
contract
at this point the buyer can proceed to
configuration
it is important to note that the payer
account will go through the process i
just described if there are any other
linked accounts that need to use the
private offer and licenses then the
linked accounts go in and choose accept
contract
this gives the linked accounts access to
the instances and instance types the
payer account purchased
once the buyer has subscribed they will
be billed according to the payment
schedule they subscribed to any
additional usage of the product is built
at the hourly rate dictated in the
private offer and invoiced on the 3rd of
the following month
[Music]
thank you if you have any further
questions please reach out to mpcusdesk
amazon.com
